chapter.title: Using HTML anchors
chapter.p: You can direct users to any section of a card or page via a URL.

topic.title: How to direct to a specific section in any page or card

steps.item: Switch to HTML editing mode by clicking source tab on the toolbar

item.p: Add a named anchor in the spot that you want to jump to (e.g. you want to direct to the “UI” section in your card)
item.item: In WYSIWYG edit mode, the UI section will have a flag to indicate you have a HTML anchor tag there. The flag will disappear when you save but the text will be blue.

steps.item:
Now you can easily go to this section of the card via URL. For example,
http://url_to_your_card#UI
When you open this URL, the card will be loaded and the section, "UI - Jump to here", will be shown at the top of the browser.
